findings.title: Race Condition Between approve() And transferFrom()
findings.description: The current `STN` ERC20 implementation has a known race condition issue between `approve()` and `transferFrom()`

findings.title: Improved Event Generation With Indexed Assets
findings.description: In Ethereum, events are used to record runtime dynamics and store arguments passed in transaction logs. The generation of events per ERC20 specification has been examined.
